oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Large and ornate induction notification of Pettis Graham Gordon
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This was something purchased by the family to honor the soldier who had enlisted. Pettis Graham Gordon served in Co. M, 323rd Inf. Regt., 81st Div. and saw action in the Meuse-Argonne Offensive. He was a farmer from Rutherford County, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
